title: By the King, a proclamation for prevention of disorders which may be committed by souldiers
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the fourth day of December, in the four and twentieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
